name: Sofyma Web
tag_list: psd-to-html, psd-to-xhtml, convert-image-to-xhtml, convert-psd-to-html, psd-to-css, psd-html, slicing-psd, psd-2-html, slice-psd, convert-psd-to-xhtml, ecommerce, b2b, b2c, google-analytics, google-base, online-shop, mvc
overview:
Sofyma Web is a Quality Outsourcing Web Development Company based in Bulgaria, looking to establish long term relationships with clients worldwide.

We specialize in eCommerce development, asp.net/php/flash, psd to xhtml and conversions, content management systems and we provide developers on a fulltime basis for your business or at an hourly/daily rate to support your ongoing projects.
